trans-unit.source: Provides design-time visual support for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 提供設計階段視覺支援<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The WebPartDesigner class provides the visual representation for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: WebPartDesigner 類別提供的視覺化表示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項在設計階段。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: It is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner> class and adds validation to verify that the associated control is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control or derived type.
trans-unit.target: 它衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner>類別，以及新增驗證來驗證相關聯的控制項是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項或衍生型別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner>

trans-unit.source: WebPartDesigner inherits a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property from its parent that is always set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: WebPartDesigner 繼承<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>屬性從一定會設定為其父代`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: This causes the visual design environment to generate a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to hold a temporary copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> on the design surface; this copy is then persisted into markup.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致視覺設計環境，以產生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制保存的暫存副本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>設計介面上此複本會接著保存標記。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: If you override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property to return `false`, the visual design environment generates markup directly from the actual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>屬性，以傳回`false`，視覺化設計環境會直接從實際產生標記<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Web Parts designers generally act much like regular control designers; the principal methods for setting design-time appearance derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件設計工具通常做為更一般的控制項設計工具;設定設計階段外觀的主要方法是衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Specifically, you can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to change the design-time markup associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 具體來說，您可以覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法，以變更與控制項關聯的設計階段標記。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can likewise override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> methods to handle errors and empty strings (""), respectively.
trans-unit.target: 您同樣可以覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法來處理錯誤和空字串 ("")，分別。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Binds the designer to a control and validates that the control is a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 繫結至控制項的設計工具，並驗證控制項是<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>與這個設計工具相關聯的控制項。
